I agree with the feedback regarding the layout breaking on mobile view. Consider tweaking the CSS grid or flexbox settings to fix this. Great job on the initial setup!

title: Revert PR#7: Address Security Vulnerabilities in RBAC Implementation
summary: This revert is necessary due to identified security vulnerabilities in the RBAC implementation introduced in PR#7. The current role assignment and validation process has gaps that could allow unauthorized access, particularly with nested permissions. Reverting this PR will help mitigate potential security risks while a more secure solution is developed.

review_states.comment: Looks good
Approved

title: Implement Fallback Mechanism for Non-Quantum Systems
summary: Develop a robust fallback mechanism that allows the parameter tuning engine to operate on systems that do not support quantum computing, ensuring consistent performance across all environments.

The documentation is clear and provides good instructions on how the fallback mechanism operates. Everything looks solid to me. LGTM, approved as well! üöÄ

title: Enhance Dashboard Navigation Features
summary: Improve the navigation features of the analytics dashboard to ensure a seamless and intuitive user experience.

review_states.comment: The navigation bar looks great and covers all major sections. The labels and icons are clear and intuitive. Did we gather any user feedback on the new design? It would be great to incorporate any insights from actual users.

The design is very user-friendly, but the performance could be optimized further. The navigation seems sluggish when switching between sections, especially in the 'Reports' section. Consider looking into lazy loading some components.

title: Enhance Blockchain Data Privacy Measures
summary: Introduce advanced data privacy measures to protect sensitive information stored on the blockchain.

review_states.comment: The data encryption and integration of zero-knowledge proofs are well executed. However, the section on regular privacy audits is missing, which is essential for compliance with data protection standards. Please add this part.
The encryption and zero-knowledge proofs are well done, but the audits are crucial for ongoing compliance. Please update the PR to include regular privacy audits.

title: Revert PR# 13: Enhance Security with New Encryption Methods
summary: This revert is necessary due to potential security risks introduced by the new encryption methods in PR# 13. Reverting this PR will allow us to reassess and address these issues to ensure our systems remain secure.

title: Implement Real-Time Data Updates in Dashboard

review_states.comment: The WebSocket integration looks solid, but there's a slight lag when multiple updates come in quickly. Consider optimizing the update frequency or batching updates. Also, the user notifications for data updates could be more noticeable.
The system is stable under normal load, but performance dips with high concurrent users. Consider optimizing server-side handling of WebSocket connections.
